name: Carrier Deck
description: Carrier Deck is a fast paced time management game where you play as the Air Boss on board the CVN-76 in the midst of active war.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.3GHZ CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX10 compatible graphics card  Shader model 3+ DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 244 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
